Scripts.OnClick: PlaySound(SOUNDKIT.IG_MAINMENU_OPTION_CHECKBOX_ON) LFGListSearchPanel_SetCategory(LFGListFrame.SearchPanel, self.categoryID, LFGListFrame.SearchPanel.preferredFilters or 0, LFGListFrame.baseFilters) LFGListSearchPanel_DoSearch(LFGListFrame.SearchPanel) LFGListFrame_SetActivePanel(LFGListFrame, LFGListFrame.SearchPanel)
